item.title: Building a Strong Brand Identity
item.description: ‘Brand Image’: Why Its a Big Deal and How to Get Started Today’s crowded marketplace requires more than just a logo.

item.title: Digital Marketing: The Why & How
item.description: Why is Digital Marketing So Important? In an age where the average joe spends at least a quarter of their net lifetime on their devices, it goes without saying that marketing your wares on the digital web is an absolute no-brainer.

item.title: The 'A' in 'AI': Getting Started
item.description: Artificial Intelligence I asked ChatGPT to write me a joke… “Why did the AI go to therapy? Because it was feeling existential and questioning its purpose.
